categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: A small secret base was established by the Rebel Alliance on the planet Randa during the Galactic Civil War.
This Rebel base contained at least two T-65 X-wing starfighters.
In 0 ABY, Han Solo and Chewbacca traveled to this base to check on Luke Skywalker. Shortly after their landing, R2-D2 and C-3PO discovered Mira Volz hiding aboard the Millennium Falcon.
Sometime later, the base was decimated by the Galactic Empire. As a reward for this success, Admiral Gaen Drommel would eventually be given command of the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Guardian.
